scenarios.name: Andrés – Industrial Automation Engineer
scenarios.quote_en: How can I optimize a production line using integrated PLC systems, sensors, and remote monitoring through IntegraDeline?
scenarios.description_en: Andrés looks for automation solutions that help him design efficient control logic, visualize real-time data, and ensure interoperability among industrial devices.

scenarios.name: Laura – Industrial Software Developer
scenarios.quote_en: How can I securely connect my plant’s control application to an existing SCADA system using IntegraDeline’s digital platforms?
scenarios.description_en: Laura explores the Digital Solutions section to learn about industrial APIs, Firebase integration, and secure cloud-based platforms for reliable data exchange.

scenarios.name: Ricardo – Electronics Design Specialist
scenarios.quote_en: How can I submit my PCB design files to request manufacturing and component validation through IntegraDeline?
scenarios.description_en: Ricardo visits the Electronic Design area to upload schematics, request prototype fabrication, and receive expert support in optimizing his electronic designs.

scenarios.name: Marta – Production Plant Supervisor
scenarios.quote_en: How can I monitor plant performance and reduce downtime with IntegraDeline’s automation and reporting tools?
scenarios.description_en: Marta accesses the Automation Projects section to visualize KPIs, schedule maintenance, and analyze energy-efficiency reports in real time.

scenarios.name: Kevin – Mechatronics Student
scenarios.quote_en: Where can I learn to program PLCs and build my first cloud-connected automation projects?
scenarios.description_en: Kevin visits the future IntegraDeline Academy, where he can access tutorials, simulations, and real-world projects to strengthen his practical automation skills.
